name: EnvironmentalSensorData
doc: Environmental sensor data schema for ESP-NOW panel with temperature, humidity, pressure, and air quality measurements.

fields.name: temperature
fields.doc: Temperature reading in degrees Celsius. Range: -50°C to 100°C. The double type is a double precision (64-bit) IEEE 754 floating-point number.

fields.name: humidity
fields.doc: Relative humidity reading in percentage. Range: 0% to 100%. The double type is a double precision (64-bit) IEEE 754 floating-point number.

fields.name: pressure
fields.doc: Atmospheric pressure reading in hectopascals (hPa). Range: 800 hPa to 1200 hPa. The double type is a double precision (64-bit) IEEE 754 floating-point number.

fields.name: tvoc
fields.doc: Total Volatile Organic Compounds concentration in mg/m³. Range: 0 to 10 mg/m³. The double type is a double precision (64-bit) IEEE 754 floating-point number.

fields.name: formaldehyde
fields.doc: Formaldehyde (HCHO) concentration in mg/m³. Range: 0 to 1.5 mg/m³. The double type is a double precision (64-bit) IEEE 754 floating-point number.

fields.name: co2
fields.doc: Carbon Dioxide (CO₂) concentration in parts per million (ppm). Range: 0 to 10000 ppm. The double type is a double precision (64-bit) IEEE 754 floating-point number.

fields.name: timestamp
fields.doc: Unix timestamp in milliseconds when the measurement was taken. The long type is a 64-bit signed integer.

fields.name: device_id
fields.doc: Unique identifier for the device that generated this reading. The string is a unicode character sequence.
